SELECT BUY.BUY_CODE , BUY_PRICE , TO_CHAR(BUY_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS BUY_DATE , ATTACHED_FILE_NAME , GOODS_NAME , GOODS_PRICE , BUY_DETAIL_CNT , BUY_DETAIL_PRICE , CASE WHEN ORDER_NO = 1 THEN '주문접수' WHEN ORDER_NO = 2 THEN '배송준비' WHEN ORDER_NO = 3 THEN '배송중' WHEN ORDER_NO = 4 THEN '배송완료' ELSE '배송완료' END AS ORDER_STR
, (SELECT COUNT(BUY_DETAIL_CODE) FROM GOODS_BUY_DETAIL WHERE BUY_CODE = BUY.BUY_CODE) AS ETC
FROM GOODS_BUY BUY, GOODS GOODS, GOODS_IMAGE IMG, GOODS_BUY_DETAIL BD WHERE BD.GOODS_CODE = GOODS.GOODS_CODE AND GOODS.GOODS_CODE = IMG.GOODS_CODE AND BUY.BUY_CODE = BD.BUY_CODE AND MEM_ID = #{memId} AND IS_MAIN = 'Y'
AND TO_CHAR(BUY_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD') >= TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, #{month}), 'YYYYMMDD')
AND TO_CHAR(BUY_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') >= #{fromDate} AND TO_CHAR(BUY_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') <= #{toDate}
ORDER BY BUY_DATE DESC

WITH IMSI_TABLE AS ( SELECT GOODS_CODE , (SELECT GOODS_CATE_CODE FROM GOODS WHERE GOODS_CODE = GOODS_BUY_DETAIL.GOODS_CODE) AS CATE_CODE , BUY_DETAIL_CNT FROM GOODS_BUY_DETAIL ) SELECT CATE_CODE , (SELECT GOODS_CATE_NAME FROM GOODS_CATEGORY WHERE GOODS_CATE_CODE = IMSI_TABLE.CATE_CODE) AS CATE_NAME , SUM(BUY_DETAIL_CNT) AS SUM_BUY_CNT FROM IMSI_TABLE GROUP BY CATE_CODE
